file.name: OpenLineage.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: OpenLineage
  version: 0.0.1
  description: OpenLineage is an open source **lineage and metadata collection API** for the data ecosystem.
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html
paths:
  /lineage:
    post:
      summary: Send an event related to the state of a run
      description: Updates a run state for a job.
      operationId: postRunEvent
      tags:
        - OpenLineage
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: 'OpenLineage.json#/$defs/RunEvent'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /lineage: post: operation "postRunEvent": requestBody: content: "application/json": parse schema: parse schema: resolve "OpenLineage.json#/$defs/RunEvent": find schema: external base "OpenLineage.json" is not supported
